EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-10-23-Community Survey.Completed Survey Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Your reward for completing Turbonomic's 2018 Community Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our 2018 Community Survey, your feedback is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, here's your $10.00 Amazon.com gift card. Please follow the link below to claim this offer.
Regards, Megan
